titleStmt.title: A sermon preached to the Honorable House of Commons, at their late solemne fast, Wednesday, Feb. 26. 1644. / By John Maynard, minister of the Word of God at Mayfield in Sussex, and a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Maynard, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Bishop, for Samuel Gellibrand, at the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard.
